name: Monkey See Monkey Do
description: This gin cocktail from Matthew Biancaniello of the Library Bar in Los Angeles is vividly peachy.
recipeIngredient: 3 shiso leaves, plus 1 more for garnish (see note)
3/4 ounce freshly squeezed juice from 1 to 2 limes

recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker, muddle white peach, shiso leaves, lime juice, and agave syrup into a rough pulp.
Add St. Germain and gin, fill shaker with ice, and shake until well chilled, about 10 seconds. Fill a rocks glass with ice, strain drink into it, garnish with shiso leaf and serve.
